titles.title: For the relief of Larry Errol Pieterse.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.
Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 105-644.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 12.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Hatch without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 610.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Waives the grounds for removal or deportation of a named individual by reason of any offense for which he received a full pardon from the Governor of Florida. Provides permanent resident status for such individual.
